name: Pose Group PTE. LTD.
description: Operator of a media production house intended to inform users about recent events and happenings. The company publishes news and photos of events, nightlife entertainment, celebrity information and other entertainment-related subjects along with event organizing services, enabling individuals to stay updated on recent and significant advancements in the fields.
